member.name: M:LibraryManagement.Service.ServiceBaseCore`2.DeepLoad(`0,System.Boolean,LibraryManagement.Dao.DeepLoadType,System.Type[],LibraryManagement.Dao.Bases.DeepSession)
member.summary: Deep Load the entire Entity object with criteria based on the child types array and the DeepLoadType.
member.remarks: Use this method with caution as it is possible to DeepLoad with recursion and traverse an entire collection's object graph.

DeepLoadType Enumeration to Include/Exclude object property collections from Load.

A collection of child types for easy access.

member.summary: public virtual method that Inserts a Book object into the datasource using a transaction.

member.summary: public virtual method that Inserts rows in to the datasource.
member.param: Book objects in a object to Insert.
member.remarks: This function will only Insert entity objects marked as dirty and have an identity field equal to zero. Upon Inserting the objects, each dirty object will have the public method Object.AcceptChanges() called to make it clean. After Inserting into the datasource, the Book objects will be updated to refelect any changes made by the datasource. (ie: identity or computed columns)
member.returns: Returns the number of successful Insert.
